title: Random lag in game
body:
Hi all,

So I was playing casually yesterday. My ping is at 20ms.
But suddenly the ping goes haywire between 400-1200ms.

I dont think this is because someone is torrenting in my house.
If it is because of torrents, the lag ping will be stable, usually around 800ms.
But not in this case.

I am in Sydney
Using Windows 7
Lag happens around 11pm to 1am.

Am I the only one experiencing this?

replies.body:
Hey RonyStark,

Can you try the solutions provided in the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) Riot Games Support article?
